pages.text: bali alladhina kafaru fi ʿizzatin washiqaqin
kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarnin fanadaw walata hina manasin
waʿajibu an jaahum mundhirun min'hum waqala l-kafiruna hadha sahirun kadhabun
ajaʿala l-alihata ilahan wahidan inna hadha lashayon ʿujabun
wa-intalaqa l-mala-u min'hum ani im'shu wa-is'biru ʿala alihatikum inna hadha lashayon yuradu
ma samiʿ'na bihadha fi l-milati l-akhirati in hadha illa ikh'tilaqun
a-unzila ʿalayhi l-dhik'ru min baynina bal hum fi shakkin min dhik'ri bal lamma yadhuqu ʿadhabi
am ʿindahum khazainu rahmati rabbika l-ʿazizi l-wahabi
am lahum mul'ku l-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma falyartaqu fi l-asbabi
jundun ma hunalika mahzumun mina l-ahzabi
kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin waʿadun wafir'ʿawnu dhu l-awtadi
wathamudu waqawmu lutin wa-ashabu al'aykati ulaika l-ahzabu
in kullun illa kadhaba l-rusula fahaqqa ʿiqabi
wama yanzuru haulai illa sayhatan wahidatan ma laha min fawaqin
waqalu rabbana ʿajjil lana qittana qabla yawmi l-hisabi
